Question
========
True or false? If the position-time graph of an object is a horizontal line, then the object must be at rest.

Answerlist
----------
* True
* False

Solution
========
True. The slope of the position time graph is the object's velocity and the slope of a horizontal line is zero. Therefore, the object must have a velocity of zero and be at rest.
